content: boho flair meets vintage vibes in this granny square bandana made from scraps of fingering weight yarn for a unique patchwork look it can be worn as a head scarf or neckerchief finished with a delicate simple lace border **materials** small amounts of fingering weight yarn in various colors small amount of a neutral yarn for the border and ties 3 5 mm e-4 crochet hook yarn needle for sewing and weaving in threads you can use approx 40g of any fingering weight yarn gather your scraps of fingering weight yarn play around with mini skeins and leftovers until you find a combination you love you can stick to a color scheme or go completely random using just one color would also look fantastic have fun creating your own unique patchwork masterpiece
